rows.label: qst701402_msg0001
rows.name:
We got through the desert without
much issue, but then...

rows.label: qst701402_msg0002
rows.name:
Then we encountered a whole host of
Tizza Parisax swarming all over the
Braying Canyon!

rows.label: qst701402_msg0003
rows.name:
If we don't do something about them,
we'll never get this pile of food safely
to Aletta.

rows.label: qst701402_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sorry to impose on you again,
but I need your help with this...

rows.label: qst701402_msg0102
rows.name:
I take it you've disposed of those pesky
Tizza Parisax?

rows.label: qst701402_msg0104
rows.name:
What? If you apply Pestronella Oil,
they don't attack you?!

rows.label: qst701402_msg0106
rows.name: That's so like you, Prince Adel!

rows.label: qst701402_msg0107
rows.name:
You didn't want to eradicate the Tizza
Parisax, so you found a peaceful way
of getting round them, didn't you?

rows.label: qst701402_msg0108
rows.name:
You don't just care about the people
of Torna, but about the beasts as well!

rows.label: qst701402_msg0109
rows.name:
Because wiping out one species would
throw off the whole ecosystem, and
that would lead to real food shortages.

rows.label: qst701402_msg0110
rows.name: Wow. What can I say? I'm impressed.

rows.label: qst701402_msg0111
rows.name:
I owe you a great debt, and I'll gladly
perform any service you'd have me
perform to repay it!

rows.label: qst701402_msg0112
rows.name:
Though speaking of services, I'd better
get that food back to base, or Augusto-san
and the others will have my head...

rows.label: qst701402_msg0113
rows.name:
We'll be on our way then. Come
and see us in Aletta sometime!
